title: Design and Implementation of Remote Language Education Utilizing Educational Technology Trends

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing language education design capabilities through VR-based simulation environments applying real-world work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can establish personalized language education strategies through data-driven learning design.
Learners can execute effective language teaching methods in non-face-to-face environments using TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) tools.
Learners can design strategies to promote social interaction among adult learners in VR simulation environments.
Learners can continuously improve educational courses using learning analytics tools to achieve an 85%+ target achievement rate in summative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
